I'm an Associate Professor in the Department of Epidemiology at 
Emory University's [Rollins School of Public Health](https://www.sph.emory.edu/).

My research interests are heavily oriented towards epidemiologic methods generally. 
I have done work in causal inference, machine learning, social epidemiology, 
and reproductive epidemiology.
